targets.rawSql: SELECT source_reverse_dns, source_base_domain, SUM(count) FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_reverse_dns, source_base_domain ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC LIMIT 2000

panels.title: Top 2000 Message Sources by Reverse DNS

targets.rawSql: SELECT source_country, SUM(count) FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_country LIMIT 50
SELECT source_ip_address, source_reverse_dns, source_base_domain, SUM(count) FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_ip_address, source_reverse_dns, source_base_domain ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC LIMIT 1000

panels.title: Top 1000 Forensic Sample Source IP Addresses
